fullText:
Brimming Wrath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Half-orc, furious assault racial power, battlemind
Benefit: When you use your furious assault and have at least 1 power point, each enemy marked by you takes psychic damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 131.
